Pumps Energy Consumption Model

Data

We get historical energy consumption data. We processed this to get values per pump and day.

Pumps

We group pumps according with their operational similarities (Exp, a group 1 that is made of pumps 68P004A-B-C)​.

Model

We chose a linear model because it’s simplicity and good results, and use minimun squares method for that purpose.

Note

The resulting model gives an \(r^2\) above \(0.93\).

Validation

We plot model predictions vs historical data and a find a good match between four variables (\(Q\), \(P\), \(RPM\), and energy).
